name: Bugged (itch) (cat da dum dev)
description: Spread, destroy and evolve. You're a bored hacker and decide to make an extremely fast spreading virus called Disregard OS. In Steel Web Clicker, you click to destroy infected computers for money or spread your virus. In Bugger, evolve your virus using money to automate spreading and destroying or make the process easier. And finally in Hacko, get tips for what combo of evolutions will get you to different endings. All in the game Bugged. everything by me other than the art done by my friend.
